snippet: Dodge is withdrawing from Nascar competition at the end of this season. Penske Racing fields Dodge cars in Sprint Cup and the Nationwide series, but announced in February it was switching to Fords.
abstract: Dodge is withdrawing from Nascar competition at the end of the racing season.
lead_paragraph: Dodge is withdrawing from Nascar competition at the end of this season. Penske Racing fields Dodge cars in Sprint Cup and the Nationwide series, but announced in February it was switching to Fords.

headline.main: Dodge Decides to Drop Out of Nascar
headline.print_headline: Dodge Decides to Drop Out of Nascar
